maps.gml

Class GMLMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • maps.gml.GMLMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Map

    public class GMLMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements Map
    A GML map. All coordinates are specified in m.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GMLMap()
      Construct an empty GML map.

        public boolean hasSize()
        Find out if this map has a real size or not. Maps with zero or one nodes do not have a real size.
        Returns:
        True if this map has two or more nodes.

      • ensureEdge

        public GMLEdge ensureEdge(GMLNode first,
                 GMLNode second)
        Create or retrieve an existing edge between two nodes.
        Parameters:
        first - The 'start' node.
        second - The 'end' node.
        Returns:
        A new GMLEdge with a unique ID or an existing edge. The returned edge may be reversed with respect to first and second.

        Returns:

                                             double yMin,
                                             double xMax,
                                             double yMax)
        Get all GMLNodes inside a region.
        Parameters:
        xMin - The lower X bound of the region.
        yMin - The lower Y bound of the region.
        xMax - The upper X bound of the region.
        yMax - The upper Y bound of the region.
        Returns:
        All GMLNodes inside the region.

        Parameters:

      • mergeEdges

        public GMLEdge mergeEdges(GMLEdge edge1,
                 GMLEdge edge2)
        Merge a pair of edges and form a new edge. The node and existing edges are not removed from the map.
        Parameters:
        edge1 - The first edge.
        edge2 - The second edge.
        Returns:
        The new edge.

      • replaceNode

        public void replaceNode(GMLNode oldNode,
               GMLNode newNode)
        Replace all references to a node with another node. This does not delete the old node from the map.
        Parameters:
        oldNode - The node to replace.
        newNode - The new node.

      • replaceEdge

        public void replaceEdge(GMLEdge oldEdge,
               GMLEdge newEdge)
        Replace all references to an edge with another edge. This does not delete the old edge from the map. The two edges must have the same pair of start and end nodes but may be in different directions.
        Parameters:
        oldEdge - The edge to replace.
        newEdge - The new edge.

      • splitEdge

        public java.util.Collection<GMLEdge> splitEdge(GMLEdge edge,
                                      GMLNode node)
        Insert a node into an edge. This method updates attached edges but does not delete the old edge.
        Parameters:
        edge - The edge to split.
        node - The node to insert.
        Returns:
        The two new edges.
